402.name: Payment Required
402.message: you have exceeded the daily limit on the api request

403.name: Forbidden
403.message: you are not permitted to perform this action

405.name: Method Not Allowed
405.message: requested API has not provide this method

500.name: Internal Server Error
500.message: server has encountered an unexpected condition

503.name: Service Unavailable
503.message: server is currently unable to provide the service
